objects

Class Shares

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.Shares

  • public class Shares
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Describes the Shares object which is subsequently a property of Company and Shareholder objects
    Author:
    Fernando Rodriguez

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shares(Company originCompany, Shareholder shareOwner, int shareAmount, double price)
      Share object Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double geSharePrice()
      Getter: returns the price at which the Shares were bought.
      Company getOriginCompany()
      Getter: returns originCompany Origin Company object of which the Shares were bought.
      int getShareAmount()
      Getter: returns the amount of Shares bought by the Shareholder.
      Shareholder getShareOwner()
      Getter: returns Shareholder owner of the Shares.
      void setOriginCompany(Company originCompany)
      Setter: Changes the Origin Company of which the shares came from.
      void setShareAmount(int shareAmount)
      Setter: Sets the shareAmount of the Share to a new Amount
      void setShareOwner(Shareholder shareOwner)
      Setter: Changes the Shareholder for this Share.

      Assigns a new price for the Shares.

      This method will convert the object into a line formated to be stored in the reports.txt file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shares

        public Shares(Company originCompany,
              Shareholder shareOwner,
              int shareAmount,
              double price)
        Share object Constructor.
        Parameters:
        originCompany - Origin Company object of which the Shares were bought.
        shareOwner - Shareholder object that refers to the owner of the Shares.
        shareAmount - Amount of shares that were bought by the Shareholder.
        price - original price at which the Shares were bought by the Shareholder.
